330120.「主神グランゼニスよ。よくぞ ご無事で！\n 先刻 ジア・クトの軍勢が飛び去るさ:
Gran Zenith! Thank goodness you're safe!
Just moments ago, I saw the Dia Kut's army
flying away...

330124.「……なるほど。ウォルドの聖なる水に\n 守られし 地下神殿に\n 己が身を封じ:
I see... So you mean to protect Zeniath by sealing yourself within this underground templeーprotected by Angelfall's sacred
waters.

330125.「ならば その前に すべての元凶である\n 女神ゼネシアを 罰するべきです！:
If you mean to do this, then...we must punish
Zenethia! She is the cause of all of this!

330127.「まだ かばいだてを なさるか！？\n 大樹の鳥籠に 幽閉するだけでは 手ぬるい:
You still wish to protect her?! Imprisoning her within the Tree's Cage is far too lenient! You must make a merciless decision hereー
for ALL of Zeniath!

330130.「二度目はない……と せめて\n そう お誓いください。\n ゼニアスと ゼニア:
Please, at the very least... You must swear
that this will not happen again. For the
sake of Zeniath, and all its people...

330133.「……なんと。\n かの女神は とうに 息絶えたのか……！:
What?!
So the goddess has already breathed her
last breath...?!

330136.「あんっだけ言っても 聞く耳 持たねぇとは\n とんだ 親バカ じいさんだぜ……:
Even after everything I said he STILL wouldn't
listen...! You stubborn old coot...! And on
top of that, I get stuck with clean-up duty!!

330137.「あーあ！ こーんな オヤジ丸出しの\n ゴッツ～い姿に なっちまうたぁ！\n:
Aaaah! I've turned into the spitting image
of that old geezer! Poor, poor me!!

330139.「創失の呪いは すさまじいモンだ。\n 我々 天使ですら 消え去るかもしれねぇ。:
The curse of unmaking's quite terrifying.
Even us angels might vanish 'cause of it...
Zeniath's really toast this time.

330140.「呪いが ウォルドから 漏れ出さねェように\n 峠のほこらを 閉ざした後……\n:
After I close the Mountain Pass Shrine to stop
the curse from leaking out...I'll hide inside
the Grounds of the Covenant.

330141.「リムネル。悪ぃが お前はなんとか耐えてくれ。\n もしもの時は 湖に 身を隠せ:
Sorry, Rimnelーbut you're gonna have to hang in there somehow. If things get bad, hide in the lake. Its sacred waters'll protect you
from the curse.

330143.「ゼネシアには 気をつけろ。\n いかなることが あろうと\n けっして あいつ:
Beware of Zenethia. No matter what happens,
never reveal yourself to her.

330144.「しかし 女神ゼネシア様は 大樹の鳥籠に\n 封じられております。\n もう 心:
But Zenethia is sealed within the Tree's
Cage. Surely I don't have to worry...?

330145.「ゼネシアは 時を超えるチカラを得た。:
Zenethia has gained the power to transcend
time.

330146.「伝説に聞く 時の民の世界に 手を出したか\n それとも 他の手段によってか\n:
Did she meddle in the world of the Timelings the legends speak of? Or did she do it another way? I don't really know... But, regardlessー
she can travel through time.

330147.「今 幽閉されてるからって 油断すんなヨ？\n お前ら 純朴な天使じゃ コロッと:
Don't let your guard down just 'cause she's all locked up now, 'kay? You pure-hearted angels are sooo gullible and naive... You'd
get tricked and beat up in no time flat!

330148.「……じゃあな。\n お互い 運が良けりゃ また会おうぜ！:
See ya. If we're both lucky, then...we'll
see each other again!

330149.「……うむ。仇敵 ジア・クトは\n 我が 創失の呪いを恐れて 去った。\n 長き:
Yes... The Dia Kut have retreated,
fearing my curse of unmaking.
This long battle is finally over.

330150.「他に 手はなかったとはいえ\n このままでは 創失の呪いがゼニアスを滅ぼす。\:
I had no other choice... If this continues,
the curse will destroy all of Zeniath. And so,
I... I must seal myself away.

330152.「……すべての咎は 我にある。\n それに……娘ゼネシアは すでに罰した。\n:
...The blame is mine alone. Besides...I have
already punished my daughter. This is the
last time she will ever cause trouble.

330153.「かつて 我が過ちを 身を挺して正し\n 赦してくれた者がいた……。:
There once was someone who risked their life
to right the wrongs I committed...and forgave
me.

330154.「ならば 我も また……\n 娘の過ちを赦し 正さねばならぬだろう……。:
That is why... I too must right the wrongs of
my daughter and show her forgiveness...

330155.「……よかろう。ここに 誓おう。\n その証として そなたに 我が記憶を託す。\:
...Very well. I swear it. As proof, I will
entrust you with my memories.
The rest...I leave to you.

330157.<center>マギエルよ……ルティアナが 還る日まで\n ……ゼニアスを 頼ん:
Magiel...until the day Lutiana returns...
...I leave Zeniath...to you...!
